verses.verse: And <WG1161> Jesus <WG2424> being full <WG4134> of the Holy <WG40> Ghost <WG4151> returned <WG5290> from <WG575> Jordan, <WG2446> and <WG2532> was led <WG71> by <WG1722> the <WG3588> Spirit <WG4151> into <WG1519> the <WG3588> wilderness, <WG2048>

Being forty <WG5062> days <WG2250> tempted <WG3985> of <WG5259> the <WG3588> devil. <WG1228> And <WG2532> in <WG1722> those <WG1565> days <WG2250> he did <WG3756> eat <WG5315> nothing: <WG3762> and <WG2532> when they <WG846> were ended, <WG4931> he afterward <WG5305> hungered. <WG3983>

And <WG2532> the <WG3588> devil <WG1228> said <WG2036> unto him, <WG846> If <WG1487> thou be <WG1488> the Son <WG5207> of God, <WG2316> command <WG2036> this <WG5129> stone <WG3037> that <WG2443> it be made <WG1096> bread. <WG740>

And <WG2532> Jesus <WG2424> answered <WG611> <WG4314> him, <WG846> saying, <WG3004> It is written, <WG1125> That <WG3754> man <WG444> shall not <WG3756> live <WG2198> by <WG1909> bread <WG740> alone, <WG3441> but <WG235> by <WG1909> every <WG3956> word <WG4487> of God. <WG2316>

And <WG2532> the <WG3588> devil, <WG1228> taking him up <WG321> <WG846> into <WG1519> a high <WG5308> mountain, <WG3735> showed <WG1166> unto him <WG846> all <WG3956> the <WG3588> kingdoms <WG932> of the <WG3588> world <WG3625> in <WG1722> a moment <WG4743> of time. <WG5550>

And <WG2532> the <WG3588> devil <WG1228> said <WG2036> unto him, <WG846> All <WG537> this <WG5026> power <WG1849> will I give <WG1325> thee, <WG4671> and <WG2532> the <WG3588> glory <WG1391> of them: <WG846> for <WG3754> that is delivered <WG3860> unto me; <WG1698> and <WG2532> to whomsoever <WG3739> <WG1437> I will <WG2309> I give <WG1325> it. <WG846>
If <WG1437> thou <WG4771> therefore <WG3767> wilt worship <WG4352> me, <WG3450> all <WG3956> shall be <WG2071> thine. <WG4675>

And <WG2532> Jesus <WG2424> answered <WG611> and said <WG2036> unto him, <WG846> Get <WG5217> thee behind <WG3694> me, <WG3450> Satan: <WG4567> for <WG1063> it is written, <WG1125> Thou shalt worship <WG4352> the Lord <WG2962> thy <WG4675> God, <WG2316> and <WG2532> him <WG846> only <WG3441> shalt thou serve. <WG3000>

And <WG2532> he brought <WG71> him <WG846> to <WG1519> Jerusalem, <WG2419> and <WG2532> set <WG2476> him <WG846> on <WG1909> a pinnacle <WG4419> of the <WG3588> temple, <WG2411> and <WG2532> said <WG2036> unto him, <WG846> If <WG1487> thou be <WG1488> the Son <WG5207> of God, <WG2316> cast <WG906> thyself <WG4572> down <WG2736> from hence: <WG1782>
For <WG1063> it is written, <WG1125> He shall give his angels charge <WG1781> <WG848> <WG32> over <WG4012> thee, <WG4675> to keep <WG1314> thee: <WG4571>
And <WG2532> in <WG1909> their hands <WG5495> they shall bear thee up, <WG142> <WG4571> lest at any time <WG3379> thou dash <WG4350> thy <WG4675> foot <WG4228> against <WG4314> a stone. <WG3037>
And <WG2532> Jesus <WG2424> answering <WG611> said <WG2036> unto him, <WG846> It is said, <WG2046> Thou shalt not <WG3756> tempt <WG1598> the Lord <WG2962> thy <WG4675> God. <WG2316>
And <WG2532> when the <WG3588> devil <WG1228> had ended <WG4931> all <WG3956> the temptation, <WG3986> he departed <WG868> from <WG575> him <WG846> for a season. <WG891> <WG2540>

And <WG2532> Jesus <WG2424> returned <WG5290> in <WG1722> the <WG3588> power <WG1411> of the <WG3588> Spirit <WG4151> into <WG1519> Galilee: <WG1056> and <WG2532> there went out <WG1831> a fame <WG5345> of <WG4012> him <WG846> through <WG2596> all <WG3650> the <WG3588> region round about. <WG4066>
And <WG2532> he <WG846> taught <WG1321> in <WG1722> their <WG846> synagogues, <WG4864> being glorified <WG1392> of <WG5259> all. <WG3956>

And <WG2532> he came <WG2064> to <WG1519> Nazareth, <WG3478> where <WG3757> he had been <WG2258> brought up: <WG5142> and, <WG2532> as <WG2596> his <WG846> custom <WG1486> was, he went <WG1525> into <WG1519> the <WG3588> synagogue <WG4864> on <WG1722> the <WG3588> sabbath <WG4521> day, <WG2250> and <WG2532> stood up <WG450> for to read. <WG314>

And <WG2532> there was delivered <WG1929> unto him <WG846> the book <WG975> of the <WG3588> prophet <WG4396> Isaiah. <WG2268> And <WG2532> when he had opened <WG380> the <WG3588> book, <WG975> he found <WG2147> the <WG3588> place <WG5117> where <WG3757> it was <WG2258> written, <WG1125>

The Spirit <WG4151> of the Lord <WG2962> is upon <WG1909> me, <WG1691> because <WG3739> <WG1752> he hath anointed <WG5548> me <WG3165> to preach the gospel <WG2097> to the poor; <WG4434> he hath sent <WG649> me <WG3165> to heal <WG2390> the <WG3588> brokenhearted, <WG4937> <WG2588> to preach <WG2784> deliverance <WG859> to the captives, <WG164> and <WG2532> recovering of sight <WG309> to the blind, <WG5185> to set <WG649> at <WG1722> liberty <WG859> them that are bruised, <WG2352>
To preach <WG2784> the acceptable <WG1184> year <WG1763> of the Lord. <WG2962>

And <WG2532> he closed <WG4428> the <WG3588> book, <WG975> and he gave it again <WG591> to the <WG3588> minister, <WG5257> and sat down. <WG2523> And <WG2532> the <WG3588> eyes <WG3788> of all <WG3956> them that were in <WG1722> the <WG3588> synagogue <WG4864> were <WG2258> fastened on <WG816> him. <WG846>
And <WG1161> he began <WG756> to say <WG3004> unto <WG4314> them, <WG846> This day <WG4594> is this <WG3778> Scripture <WG1124> fulfilled <WG4137> in <WG1722> your <WG5216> ears. <WG3775>

And <WG2532> all <WG3956> bare him witness, <WG3140> <WG846> and <WG2532> wondered <WG2296> at <WG1909> the <WG3588> gracious <WG5485> words <WG3056> which proceeded <WG1607> out of <WG1537> his <WG846> mouth. <WG4750> And <WG2532> they said, <WG3004> Is <WG2076> not <WG3756> this <WG3778> Joseph's <WG2501> son? <WG5207>

And <WG2532> he said <WG2036> unto <WG4314> them, <WG846> Ye will surely <WG3843> say <WG2046> unto me <WG3427> this <WG5026> proverb, <WG3850> Physician, <WG2395> heal <WG2323> thyself: <WG4572> whatsoever <WG3745> we have heard <WG191> done <WG1096> in <WG1722> Capernaum, <WG2584> do <WG4160> also <WG2532> here <WG5602> in <WG1722> thy <WG4675> country. <WG3968>
And <WG1161> he said, <WG2036> Verily <WG281> I say <WG3004> unto you, <WG5213> No <WG3762> prophet <WG4396> is <WG2076> accepted <WG1184> in <WG1722> his own <WG848> country, <WG3968>

But <WG1161> I tell <WG3004> you <WG5213> of <WG1909> a truth, <WG225> many <WG4183> widows <WG5503> were <WG2258> in <WG1722> Israel <WG2474> in <WG1722> the <WG3588> days <WG2250> of Elijah, <WG2243> when <WG3753> the <WG3588> heaven <WG3772> was shut up <WG2808> three <WG5140> years <WG2094> and <WG2532> six <WG1803> months, <WG3376> when <WG5613> great <WG3173> famine <WG3042> was <WG1096> throughout <WG1909> all <WG3956> the <WG3588> land; <WG1093>

But <WG2532> unto <WG4314> none <WG3762> of them <WG846> was Elijah <WG2243> sent, <WG3992> save <WG1508> unto <WG1519> Sarepta, <WG4558> a city of Sidon, <WG4605> unto <WG4314> a woman <WG1135> that was a widow. <WG5503>

And <WG2532> many <WG4183> lepers <WG3015> were <WG2258> in <WG1722> Israel <WG2474> in the time <WG1909> of Elisha <WG1666> the <WG3588> prophet; <WG4396> and <WG2532> none <WG3762> of them <WG846> was cleansed, <WG2511> saving <WG1508> Naaman <WG3497> the <WG3588> Syrian. <WG4948>
And <WG2532> all <WG3956> they in <WG1722> the <WG3588> synagogue, <WG4864> when they heard <WG191> these things, <WG5023> were filled <WG4130> with wrath, <WG2372>

And <WG2532> rose up, <WG450> and thrust <WG1544> him <WG846> out <WG1854> of the <WG3588> city, <WG4172> and <WG2532> led <WG71> him <WG846> unto <WG2193> the <WG3588> brow <WG3790> of the <WG3588> hill <WG3735> whereon <WG1909> <WG3739> their <WG846> city <WG4172> was built, <WG3618> that they might cast him down headlong. <WG2630> <WG846>
But <WG1161> he <WG846> passing <WG1330> through <WG1223> the midst <WG3319> of them <WG846> went his way, <WG4198>
And <WG2532> came down <WG2718> to <WG1519> Capernaum, <WG2584> a city <WG4172> of Galilee, <WG1056> and <WG2532> taught <WG2258> <WG1321> them <WG846> on <WG1722> the <WG3588> sabbath days. <WG4521>
And <WG2532> they were astonished <WG1605> at <WG1909> his <WG846> doctrine: <WG1322> for <WG3754> his <WG846> word <WG3056> was <WG2258> with <WG1722> power. <WG1849>

And <WG2532> in <WG1722> the <WG3588> synagogue <WG4864> there was <WG2258> a man, <WG444> which had <WG2192> a spirit <WG4151> of an unclean <WG169> devil, <WG1140> and <WG2532> cried out <WG349> with a loud <WG3173> voice, <WG5456>

saying, <WG3004> Let us alone; <WG1436> what have we to do with thee, <WG5101> <WG2254> <WG2532> <WG4671> thou Jesus <WG2424> of Nazareth? <WG3479> art thou come <WG2064> to destroy <WG622> us? <WG2248> I know <WG1492> thee <WG4571> who <WG5101> thou art; <WG1488> the <WG3588> Holy One <WG40> of God. <WG2316>

And <WG2532> Jesus <WG2424> rebuked <WG2008> him, <WG846> saying, <WG3004> Hold thy peace, <WG5392> and <WG2532> come <WG1831> out of <WG1537> him. <WG846> And <WG2532> when the <WG3588> devil <WG1140> had thrown <WG4496> him <WG846> in <WG1519> the <WG3588> midst, <WG3319> he came <WG1831> out of <WG575> him, <WG846> and <WG2532> hurt <WG984> him <WG846> not. <WG3367>

And <WG2532> they were <WG1909> all <WG3956> amazed, <WG2285> <WG1096> and <WG2532> spake <WG4814> among <WG4314> themselves, <WG240> saying, <WG3004> What <WG5101> a word <WG3056> is this! <WG3778> for <WG3754> with <WG1722> authority <WG1849> and <WG2532> power <WG1411> he commandeth <WG2004> the <WG3588> unclean <WG169> spirits, <WG4151> and <WG2532> they come out. <WG1831>
And <WG2532> the fame <WG2279> of <WG4012> him <WG846> went out <WG1607> into <WG1519> every <WG3956> place <WG5117> of the <WG3588> country round about. <WG4066>

And <WG1161> he arose <WG450> out of <WG1537> the <WG3588> synagogue, <WG4864> and entered <WG1525> into <WG1519> Simon's <WG4613> house. <WG3614> And <WG1161> Simon's <WG4613> wife's mother <WG3994> was <WG2258> taken with <WG4912> a great <WG3173> fever; <WG4446> and <WG2532> they besought <WG2065> him <WG846> for <WG4012> her. <WG846>

And <WG2532> he stood <WG2186> over <WG1883> her, <WG846> and rebuked <WG2008> the <WG3588> fever; <WG4446> and <WG2532> it left <WG863> her: <WG846> and <WG1161> immediately <WG3916> she arose <WG450> and ministered <WG1247> unto them. <WG846>

Now <WG1161> when the <WG3588> sun <WG2246> was setting, <WG1416> all <WG3956> they <WG3745> that had <WG2192> any sick <WG770> with divers <WG4164> diseases <WG3554> brought <WG71> them <WG846> unto <WG4314> him; <WG846> and <WG1161> he <WG3588> laid his hands on <WG2007> <WG5495> every <WG1538> one <WG1520> of them, <WG846> and healed <WG2323> them. <WG846>

And <WG1161> devils <WG1140> also <WG2532> came <WG1831> out of <WG575> many, <WG4183> crying out, <WG2896> and <WG2532> saying, <WG3004> Thou <WG4771> art <WG1488> Christ <WG5547> the <WG3588> Son <WG5207> of God. <WG2316> And <WG2532> he rebuking <WG2008> them suffered <WG1439> them <WG846> not <WG3756> to speak: <WG2980> for <WG3754> they knew <WG1492> that he <WG846> was <WG1511> Christ. <WG5547>

And <WG1161> when it was <WG1096> day, <WG2250> he departed <WG1831> and went <WG4198> into <WG1519> a desert <WG2048> place: <WG5117> and <WG2532> the <WG3588> people <WG3793> sought <WG2212> him, <WG846> and <WG2532> came <WG2064> unto <WG2193> him, <WG846> and <WG2532> stayed <WG2722> him, <WG846> that he should not <WG3361> depart <WG4198> from <WG575> them. <WG846>

And <WG1161> he <WG3588> said <WG2036> unto <WG4314> them, <WG846> I <WG3165> must <WG1163> preach <WG2097> the <WG3588> kingdom <WG932> of God <WG2316> to other <WG2087> cities <WG4172> also: <WG2532> for <WG3754> therefore <WG1519> <WG5124> am I sent. <WG649>
And <WG2532> he preached <WG2258> <WG2784> in <WG1722> the <WG3588> synagogues <WG4864> of Galilee. <WG1056>
